name: Ticketing App
description: Simple demo app for demonstrating WebCogs plugins

prompts.text: Create a widget that shows in the sidebar, showing a vertical list of all open tickets, sorted by date. Open tickets are tickets for which response = NULL.  If you click on a ticket, route to ticket_overview.

Show the ticket fields of a particular ticket, with a large area for the ticket text. The ticket ID is passed as the second parameter of the constructor.  If the response text is null, show a textarea in which a response can be entered, with a submit button to submit it.  If the response text is not null, show it in a large area.  If a response is submitted, use SQL UPDATE to set the response text and date, and route to ticket_response.
Show a bar chart that shows the number of submitted tickets per day over the last 30 days. Show dates in the form mm-dd at the x axis, and ticks on the y axis.
